idea:
DigiAlly is enabling a seamless ecosystem amongst financial institutions by empowering them with Digital Trust. In a world dominated by an increasing number of digital transactions, DigiAlly fosters the true spirit of partnerships in the digital economy by building enhanced credibility between SMEs and financial institutions.

We believe Digital lives have the potential to make unprecedented advances with Provable and Verifiable Trust Score across industries – Complete Credibility over Financial Creditworthiness.

With DigiAlly, SME’s can achieve accelerated growth by securing higher credibility with financial institutions. Our proven use case for Women run SMEs can empower them with a competitive advantage by established credibility, Faster and cheaper access to finance in turn leading to accelerated growth and innovation.

Additionally, SMEs can benefit through DigiAlly’s platform that captures Credible Environmental (ESG) Impact that can be leveraged to drive the green finance initiatives with confidence

Products and Solutions (Placement- Bottom Left)

DigiAlly’s core mission is to significantly accelerate the speed of ‘digitization of businesses’ by rendering digital trust – in a simple plug and play format. Powered by Digital Identity and Data Privacy Platform some of the 4 key solutions provided by DigiAlly are;

A. TrustScore: Enhanced control of data by enterprises building their own verifiable online reputation for enabling faster credit and funding from financials

B. InstaConnect: Enabling real-time trust with a robust ecosystem, stakeholders such as customers and digital partners can benefit from seamless customer onboarding and faster verification

C. InstaPass: Offering Global Golden passport that allows enterprises to authenticate digital resources without a password and OTP.

D. InstaProtect: Providing a secure Digital Vault for enterprises that are enabled by user consent, and can be leveraged by SMEs for improved business credibility
name: DigiAlly

idea: A mindfulness platform provides an interface between the user and the mental health professional directly or indirectly. The app serves as a medium to acquire first aid in the absence or unavailability of the mental health professional. We provide features such as guided meditation tracks, tranquilizing media channels, progress visualizers, and a mood tracker. Amigo will be able to help doctors manage their data efficiently and easily. It facilitates ease of operation for stand-alone practitioners by managing trivial tasks such as appointment scheduling, maintaining patient records, etc. AI incorporated text-to-speech and speech-to-text options to provide a flawless solution to the note-taking process further secured by Blockchain. Decentralized electronic health records provide immunity to the parties involved in case of any legal issues. All of this accompanied by a 24x7 assisted chatbot, in absence of a professional. Which also, provides SOS to helpline numbers in cases of emergencies. Amigo finds application at workplaces, educational institutes, rehabilitation centers, stand-alone practitioners who want a mainstream and simplified system to manage patient data and communication, established medical institutes for better engagement and personalized care for their patients. The corporate programs aim to promote a healthy work-life balance.
name: Amigo
